description: Commands to manage the Admin for Spring for the Container Apps environment.

commands.name: az containerapp env java-component admin-for-spring create
commands.summary: Command to create the Admin for Spring.
commands.syntax:
az containerapp env java-component admin-for-spring create --environment
                                                           --name
                                                           --resource-group
                                                           [--bind]
                                                           [--max-replicas]
                                                           [--min-replicas]
                                                           [--no-wait]
                                                           [--set-configs]
                                                           [--unbind]
examples:
az containerapp env java-component admin-for-spring create -g MyResourceGroup \
    -n MyJavaComponentName \
    --environment MyEnvironment

az containerapp env java-component admin-for-spring create -g MyResourceGroup \
    -n MyJavaComponentName \
    --environment MyEnvironment \
    --set-configurations PropertyName1=Value1 PropertyName2=Value2

az containerapp env java-component admin-for-spring create -g MyResourceGroup \
    -n MyJavaComponentName \
    --environment MyEnvironment \
    --min-replicas 2 --max-replicas 2

commands.name: az containerapp env java-component admin-for-spring delete
commands.summary: Command to delete the Admin for Spring.
commands.syntax:
az containerapp env java-component admin-for-spring delete --environment
                                                           --name
                                                           --resource-group
                                                           [--no-wait]
                                                           [--yes]
examples:
az containerapp env java-component admin-for-spring delete -g MyResourceGroup \
    -n MyJavaComponentName \
    --environment MyEnvironment

commands.name: az containerapp env java-component admin-for-spring show
commands.summary: Command to show the Admin for Spring.
commands.syntax:
az containerapp env java-component admin-for-spring show --environment
                                                         --name
                                                         --resource-group
examples:
az containerapp env java-component admin-for-spring show -g MyResourceGroup \
    -n MyJavaComponentName \
    --environment MyEnvironment

commands.name: az containerapp env java-component admin-for-spring update
commands.summary: Command to update the Admin for Spring.
commands.syntax:
az containerapp env java-component admin-for-spring update --environment
                                                           --name
                                                           --resource-group
                                                           [--bind]
                                                           [--max-replicas]
                                                           [--min-replicas]
                                                           [--no-wait]
                                                           [--remove-all-configs {false, true}]
                                                           [--remove-configs]
                                                           [--replace-configs]
                                                           [--set-configs]
                                                           [--unbind]
examples:
az containerapp env java-component admin-for-spring update -g MyResourceGroup \
    -n MyJavaComponentName \
    --environment MyEnvironment \
    --set-configurations PropertyName1=Value1 PropertyName2=Value2

az containerapp env java-component admin-for-spring update -g MyResourceGroup \
    -n MyJavaComponentName \
    --environment MyEnvironment \
    --replace-configurations PropertyName1=Value1 PropertyName2=Value2

az containerapp env java-component admin-for-spring update -g MyResourceGroup \
    -n MyJavaComponentName \
    --environment MyEnvironment \
    --remove-configurations PropertyName1 PropertyName2

az containerapp env java-component admin-for-spring update -g MyResourceGroup \
    -n MyJavaComponentName \
    --environment MyEnvironment \
    --remove-all-configurations
